title: CCL Train Fault - Paya Lebar Station

title_translations.zh-Hans: CCL 列车故障 - 巴耶利峇站
title_translations.ms: CCL Kerosakan Kereta Api - Stesen Paya Lebar
title_translations.ta: CCL ரயில் கொண்டாட்டம் - பாயா லெபர் நிலையம்

updates.text: Circle Line (CCL) service at Paya Lebar affected by a train fault causing delays; initial delay of 5 minutes, later updated to 10 minutes. Passengers were told not to board the first train, though some boarded the next train despite signs.
